import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import SectionOne from './../projectPage/SectionOne.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const data = { 'heroVideo':require('./../../content/projects/blueNote/hero.mp4'), } const a = { 'title':'Containing the Heart', 'text':'We put the heart into a box that was painted black and the interior was lined with black felt. A wooden frame was made and glued into the interior of the box. A black felt screen hides the mechanism.', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/beatbox/1.jpg'), } function BlueNote(props) { return(
) } export default BlueNote;
